m_szDocTitle: 17 governors make bipartisan pledge toward clean energy - CSMonitor.com
m_szDocSumamry: 17 governors make bipartisan pledge toward clean energy Latest News A general view shows solar panels used to produce renewable energy at the photovoltaic park in Les Mees, in the department of Alpes-de-Haute-Provence, southern France March 31, 2015. Jean-Paul Pelissier/Reuters View Caption of Citing the economic benefits of clean energy, 17 governors  – including four Republicans – have agreed to expand clean energy programs involving solar, wind, hydroelectric, and geothermal power technologies.
